item.title: About
item.author: rayspock@protonmail.com (rayspock)
item.description: I’ve had the opportunity to work with a diverse range of industries, including Blockchain, FinTech, Education, Healthcare, and Retail, building everything from small business websites to custom web applications. I love tackling challenging problems and am constantly striving to become an even better hacker.
